heading: To-Do Application in React
description: Built a responsive To-Do application using React, enabling task management with features like adding, editing, deleting, and updating statuses to enhance user experience.

heading: Pokemon API Data Fetching in React
description: Developed a React application that fetches and displays data from an external API, implementing features like dynamic data loading, error handling, and a responsive interface to improve user interaction.

heading: Movie Clone Website in React
description: Developed a movie clone website in React, using an external API for dynamic movie data fetching and React Router for smooth page navigation. Implemented a responsive design to enhance user interaction and ensure seamless content delivery.

heading: Chat Application in MERN STACK
description: A MERN chat app uses React for the frontend, Node.js and Express with Socket.IO for real-time messaging, and MongoDB for storing messages. It supports typing indicators, user authentication, and real-time updates for a seamless communication experience.
